roleset.name: intend, plan, on purpose, intent
roleset.note: INTEND-V NOTES: Frames file for 'intend' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Member of Vncls try-61, wish-62. Comparisonwith 'plan'. (from intend.01-v)
INTENTION-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-00040.Comparison to intend.01. VN classes try-61 and wish-62. FN classpurpose. Framed by Katie. (from intention.01-n)
INTENTIONED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from intentioned.01-j)
INTENTIONAL-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8.(from intentional.01-j)

roles.note: This is a comparison to intend-v. In that frame, there is an arg 2 'extracted theme due to passivization'. This was deleted in the nominal case. (from intention.01-n)

example.name: intend-v: typical usage
example.text: ...and a company spokesman said it fully intends to meet the payments.

example.name: intend-v: concatenate with passive extraction
example.text: Manville said [the shares issued to the trust]-1 were intended *trace*-1 to be sold, as needed.

example.name: intentional-j: arg1
example.text: He states that this was intentional .

example.name: intention-n: Args 0 and 1
example.text: its intention to decide by year end the size of the next increase in the IMF 's capital base
example.arg: to decide by yearend the size of the next increase in the IMF 's capital base

example.name: intent-j: Both args
example.text: Obama Announces his intent to nominate her as DOI Assistant Secretary.
example.arg: to nominate her as DOI Assistant Secretary

roleset.name: firmly fixed on a specific purpose, activity

example.name: intent-j: both args, arg1 PP with S-NOM
example.text: He is intent on becoming an investment banker.

example.name: intent-j: both args, arg1 PP with NP
intent-j: both args, less evil
example.text: The children are intent upon their books.
